description:
Custom Rich Presence (playing status) manager for Discord. Features run on startup and minimizing to tray.


- Fixed "Wrong ID?" error, but...
- Adding images was temporarily disabled.
  Discord is having a moment right now, and having images in your presence causes the whole presence to error out.
  I will release an update unlocking the images when (or "if", but let's hope for a "when") Discord fixes the issue.
- Updated Finnish, French (new translator, CercleRouge1), Polish, Slovak.
